abstract: World governing body of basketball suspends Mexican national team for government interference in sport, jeopardizing team's participation in 2016 Olympics Games; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Mexican basketball federation was suspended by the world governing body FIBA because of the national government’s interference in how the sport is run.
snippet: The Mexican basketball federation was suspended by the world governing body FIBA because of the national government’s interference in how the sport is run.
